name: Sengoku - A Time of Warriors and Demons
name_original: Sengoku - A Time of Warriors and Demons
description:
Welcome to 15th century Japan! In Sengoku, you play as a samurai sent on a desperate mission to save a kingdom under siege. As you explore this medieval, mythical world, you will battle men, monsters, and demons, all while overcoming a variety of platforming challenges. This culminates in an epic final battle against a vicious enemy with an iron grip over the kingdom. Master wall jump, dash, double jump, archery, and swordsmanship to achieve victory in this era of the warring states!

IMPORTANT NOTICE
The required keyboard layout for this game is U.S. Other layouts may result in issues where buttons fail to carry out the desired action.
